channel.title: Homes on Kelly O'Briant
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kelly O'Briant

item.description: Hi, I’m Kelly and this is the blog-extension of my GitHub account. Here I keep a record of my blogs, speaking engagements and external projects. I am an organizer of the Washington DC chapter of R-Ladies Global. It’s an R users group for lady-folk and friends. Check out our Meetup page for the latest news and events. We’re also on Twitter.

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: O’Reilly Media Introduction to Sparklyr for Data Science Web Video Tutorial, Published: September 2017 R-Ladies Washington DC Event Tutorials: Rise & Shiny [1] Semantic UI in Shiny Apps and on Shiny Servers Open Data Day Mini-Hack Easy web scraping in R with the rvest package Personal Website Workshop R Blogdown + Github + Netlify Rise & Shiny [2] Introduction to Shiny Application Development R-Ladies Fall Networking Competition Crossword Puzzle!
